definitions: The action of starting an engine or machine by turning a crank.
The action of turning a crank.
The action of producing music or sound, often loudly or with enthusiasm.
The action of turning something with a crank or handle.
The action of starting or operating something with effort.
examples: He was cranking the engine for an hour.
The band was cranking out new songs.
She was cranking the handle to raise the flag.
The old car was cranking slowly to life.
They were cranking up the volume.
